text: Paris, Texas is a 1984 German French American British drama movie directed by Wim Wenders and with the music by Ry Cooder. It stars Harry Dean Stanton, Bernhard Wicki, Dean Stockwell, Hunter Carson, Nastassja Kinski, John Lurie and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 drama movies Category:1980s road movies Category:German drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Wim Wenders Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies set in Houston Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about domestic violence Category:Movies about atonement
title: Paris, Texas (movie)
